data.name: RealRTCW - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
RealRTCW was always free and will remain like that. You dont need to buy this DLC or anything else in order to play.

If you've really enjoyed the mod and want to somehow express your gratitude to its developers - RealRTCW Supporter Pack is a great way to do so!

In return for your generousity you recieve:
  • KA-BAR USMC Fighting Knife
  • MP-34 "Elite" Skin
  • Revolver "Battle Scarred" Skin

THANK YOU! <3

data.short_description: RealRTCW Supporter Pack is a great way to express your gratitude to the mod developers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3-D Hardware Accelerator (with 256MB VRAM with full OpenGL® support)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Return to Castle Wolfenstein required to play

data.legal_notice:
RealRTCW is a free modification for Return to Castle Wolfenstein.
RealRTCW is based on Return to Castle Wolfenstein single player GNU GPL Source Code
Return to Castle Wolfenstein is a trademark of Zenimax Media and id Software.

content_descriptors.notes: This Mod contains content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence and Gore, General Mature Content
